channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: GM’s under-the-hood overhaul puts AI and automated driving at the center
item.description: The U.S. automaker's technological overhaul will debut in two years with the Cadillac Escalade IQ.

item.title: GM is bringing Google Gemini-powered AI assistant to cars in 2026
item.description: GM is the latest automaker to lean into generative AI-based assistants that promise to respond to driver requests in a more natural-sounding way. Stel...

item.title: Last-minute TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 deal: Save 60% on your plus-one’s pass before doors open on Oct 27
item.description: 5 days left until TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 kicks off in San Francisco. Buy your pass to save up to $444, plus get 60% off a second ticket. Save now.

item.title: Samsung takes on Apple’s Vision Pro with new Galaxy XR headset
item.description: Galaxy XR costs $1,800, nearly half the price of the Vision Pro.

item.title: Phonak Virto R Infinio Review: Prescription Hearing Aids With Great Fit
item.description: These prescription hearing aids are custom molded to fit your ears—and only your ears.

item.title: The Best Gifts for Rock Climbers (2025): Coros, Meta, Gramicci
item.description: Here's what to get for your friend with the fiddly little fingers and stinky feet.

item.title: GM to introduce eyes-off, hands-off driving system in 2028
item.description: GM said Cruise’s technology stack, including its AI models trained on five million driverless miles and simulation framework, feed directly into the a...

item.title: Essential Gear for an Emergency Kit—for Cars or Go-Bags
item.description: We consulted preparedness experts and WIRED's team of testers for the essential gear in case of wildfires, earthquakes, and lord knows what else.

item.title: Best iPad to Buy (and Some to Avoid) in 2025
item.description: We break down the current iPad lineup to help you figure out which of Apple’s tablets is best for you.

item.title: Best Kitchen Composters and Food Recyclers (2025)
item.description: Responsibly dispose of your food scraps with one of these indoor, (mostly) odor-free WIRED-tested devices.
